This section provides the system mission, and business rationale.

## Mission

> *The mission is to pioneer a dynamic and inclusive knowledge repository dedicated to the systems engineering facets of medical device development. Commit to harnessing the latest advancements in technology and leveraging the evolving landscape of healthcare systems to ensure the safety, efficacy, and compliance of medical devices. Through collaborative efforts and interdisciplinary insights, aim to empower stakeholders with the necessary tools and knowledge to navigate the complexities of medical device development, ultimately safeguarding patient health and well-being.*
